fullDescription.intro: This node performs a principal component analysis (PCA) on the given input data. The directions of maximal variance (the principal components) are extracted and can be used in the corresponding predictor for projection to a lower dimensional space preserving a maximum of information.

option.name: fail if missing values are encountered

fullDescription.option: If checked, execution fails if the selected columns contain missing values, else lines containing missing values are ignored.
Select columns that are included in the analysis of principal components.

ports.outPort: Covariance matrix of the input columns
Model with projection to principal components
